New Records: Jarrett Allen and Evan Mobley combined for 46 points and 22 rebounds
Key Match Events: Darius Garland's dagger sends Cavs fans into a frenzy
Cleveland's late run that featured clutch shooting and a few big stops secured a 129-122 win
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Thunder to win based on their recent performance
Coach Kenny Atkinson acknowledged there were doubts about Cleveland's ability to win this game
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Kenny Atkinson acknowledged there is very little space between these teams
The Cavaliers took every punch from the Thunder and threw a stronger one back
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams will meet again Jan. 16 in Oklahoma City
The Thunder are obsessed with winning the possession game
The Cavaliers shot an extra 10 free throws
Others: Cleveland's ability to run their offense and generate their standard amount of open looks with their tight passing and spacing against such a great defense
The Thunder dearly missed Chet Holmgren in this matchup
